word:
You need to eat the flesh and drink the blood of the Son of God. This you must do in order to have the life of Christ. You 


                             -93- 

are not living wholly by the word of God. You do not fully realize what is meant by eating the flesh and drinking the blood of the Son of God. When you understand what this means, you will see the need of the crucifixion of self. You will see your need of the pure, ennobling, sanctifying principles of God's Word.
